root.str: Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 20 missiles.
Slug Ammunition does increased damage at medium range, increasing accuracy and refire time.
Speak to Representative Nalla at Nascent Expeditions on Sanctuary
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. All factions can use this gear.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. NC use only.
Use the Warpgate Terminal to warp to a different continent
Enemy light assault in the area.
The G40 Grenade Launcher rapidly fires up to (6) 40mm grenades. The grenades do good damage to all targets.
Deadly in the hands of a skilled Infiltrator, the bolt action TSAR-42's features a unique bolt rotation system designed to improve the time between shots. TR use only.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 180 seconds.
Increases the lock-on disruption to 12 seconds.
Apply the Temperate Chaparral camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Release a caustic cloud of smoke that is capable of harming soldiers in a 5 meter radius
This customization adds a Dark Blue decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Allows 2 additional grenades of any type to be carried.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Improved cruising and afterburner speed. (More effective than previous rank)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 90 rounds.

FL-34: Listen, there's a catch. If you die or redeploy, that's it, done-zo. Getting a revive or going through a rebirth matrix will corrupt the data cache, and if you don't come out looking like a pile of goo, we'll have to do it all over again.
Earn Spawn experience to complete this directive.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 2.5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
The XMG-100's large magazine and high rate of fire solidifies its use during close-to-medium range assault scenarios. NSO use only.
Created for spec-ops missions where sniper rifles would prove unsuitable, the powerful semi-automatic Nyx VX31 scout rifle excels at medium range. VS use only.
Scorpion's payload no longer deals explosive damage, but will instead prevent vehicles within the blast radius from being repaired for 6 seconds.
Unlock Certifications for the Infiltrator's spec-ops tools. Tools can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Celebrate 18 years of PlanetSide with these limited-time offerings that call back to an earlier time.
Frag Ammunition has increased wounding capabilities at close range, dealing less direct damage and increased indirect damage.
Depending on the weapon, increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 5 or 10 standard size magazines.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Attaches a 7x optical zoom to your weapon.

Facilitator Campner: I have been informed that our analysts attempted to locate Representative Foster, but the storm's energy caused sensor distortion. In order to get an accurate scan they need a powerful signal to hone in on.
Increases the overall handling of the vehicle.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Harasser to the waypoint marked on your HUD.

Clear the waters with a loud declaration before splashing in or emit a sonar ping while stalking your enemies below the waves. This horn plays different sounds when above or below the water. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 189 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Capable ground vehicle terminals can now spawn Main Battle Tanks and capable air vehicle terminals can now spawn Liberators.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 shells.
